channel.title: EpicPkz || Where the community matters ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35ires1.png[/img]
Welcome to EpicPkz, Im currently working on this server with another developer. We hope for this to be very successful in multiple ways.
Soon we hope some of you Mopar people out there will come and enjoy our classic server.
The Team: Owner and Coder: Blake. Owner, Coder, Developer and Base maker: Joe. Administrator: Chubs. Administrator: Spot open. Administrator: Spot open. Moderator: Spot open. Moderator: Spot open. Moderator: Spot open. Moderator: Spot open. Moderator: Spot open.
Server information:
Green = Complete. Teal = In process. Red = Not started yet.
100% skills Webclient ready Voting system Donator Zone Staff Zones Training Area Home Area Teleporting system Standard combat system Advanced combat system Prayer system, With all altars Mage system, With interfaces and different spell books. Talking NPCs Working NPC dialogues Minigames Pking zones Pk box
These all of the things we have thought of adding so far, So i will keep you updated on what is going on with the server.
Please support the server and keep it on first page by commenting what you thing is good, What is bad and most of all what shall we add to the server.
Media:
Login Box / Client: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/b5s3s9.jpg[/img]
Connecting to server: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z32bna.jpg[/img]
Website: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nhj2pt.jpg[/img]
Training Zone: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/9k3xy0.jpg[/img]
This is all for now, We hope you like there server, i will be uploading more images soon when my other Developer wakes up haha.
Please keep this on the first page.
:)

item.title: EpicPkz || Where the community matters ||
item.dc:creator: @FrogPk_Developer FrogPk Developer
item.description:
@FrogPk_Developer wrote:

Project Amazed Carlos:

Support, man, but the chatbox looks bad.

Ugly aint it :/…Anyway ive given this server away to my co-owner im making new one now and this is my new account btw…Im not BentonScape or JoesServers no more so no one message me please

Read full topic

Welcome to EpicPkz, Im currently working on this server with another developer. We hope for this to be very successful in multiple ways.

Soon we hope some of you Mopar people out there will come and enjoy our classic server.
